title: Badgley Mischka stays true to its ultra-glamorous DNA
text:
Badgley Mischka stays true to its ultra-glamorous DNA 3:04pm GMT - 01:01 
The evening gown designers show a collection of brocade, velvet and silk dresses that are sure to become a hit at the red carpet. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
